issue.title: [Java] Document how to set netty/unsafe allocators
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9357](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9357). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
There are now 2 allocators available, one based on netty and one using unsafe apis. We should provide end-user documentation on which one is default and how to set and use each one.
